text: Chandler Riggs is an American actor. He is most well known for his role on the AMC original series The Walking Dead, as Carl Grimes. He was born in June 27, 1999 in Atlanta, Georgia."Chandler Riggs: Biography", TV Guide. Along with his role in The Walking Dead, he has starred in several other movies such as Get Low and Mercy. Chandler has been nominated for Best Child Actor in both 2012 and 2013. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Atlanta
title: Chandler Riggs
